description: This is a Next.js page component for displaying product details, including fetching product data from an API, rendering product info, and integrating an add-to-cart component.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static parameters for product pages by fetching the product list from an API.

methods.name: getProduct
methods.description: Fetches product details based on the provided ID.

methods.name: ProductDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component for rendering the product details page, including fetching product data and handling not found scenarios.
